ruling: - You cannot activate [[Magical Hats]] if you do not have at least 2 open Monster Card Zones.
- You must show your opponent the 2 selected Non-Monster Cards before they are Set.
- If you activate [[Magical Hats]] while [[Light of Intervention]] is active, the cards are placed in face-up Defense Position.
- If you select [[Black Pendant]], when it is destroyed during the end of the Battle Phase its effect activates, even if it was face-down.
- If one of the Non-Monster Cards is removed from play with [[Interdimensional Matter Transporter]], it is destroyed when it is returned to the field during the End Phase.

- If [[Statue of the Wicked]] or [[Dark Coffin]] are selected and they are destroyed while face-down, their effects activate. If they are flipped by an attack and destroyed, their effects do not activate.
